introduction.title: Introduction:
introduction.text: Hello, I'm Garen Ghazarian. Today is May 14, 2024. I was born in 1986 in the vibrant city of Qamishli, Syria. I'm excited to share with you my journey from a law student and computer shop owner in Syria to a chef in Belgium, and now a full-stack developer in Germany.

earlyCareer.title: Early Career in Syria:
earlyCareer.text: My professional journey began while I was studying law in Syria. During my studies, I also pursued my passion for technology by opening and managing my own computer shop. This venture allowed me to repair and sell computer equipment, providing me with invaluable business and technical skills.

movingToBelgium.title: Moving to Belgium:
movingToBelgium.text: Destiny then took me to Belgium, where I initially worked in a restaurant...

personalLife.title: Personal Life:
personalLife.text: While in Belgium, I also met my partner, and we got married...

techInGermany.title: Shifting Focus to Tech in Germany:
techInGermany.text: Later, my journey brought me to Germany, where I seized the opportunity to turn my long-time computer hobby into a formal education...

currentProject.title: Current Project:
currentProject.text: I'm now working on a challenging full-stack development project for a client from Abu Dhabi...

conclusion.title: Conclusion:
conclusion.text: Looking ahead, I am eager to continue developing and leading projects that integrate technology with business needs...

AboutMe.name: Garen Ghazarian
AboutMe.skills2List: CSS, BOOTSTRAP, TAILWIND, SASS, Responsive Design, Performance Optimization, Accessibility Standards
AboutMe.skills4List: GIT, GITHUB, JAVASCRIPT, DOM, NODEJS, EXPRESS

projects.name: KEN Beauty Center: Project Overview
projects.linkText: Click here to open the link
projects.description: KEN Beauty Center is my inaugural real-world project, developed for a client in Abu Dhabi. This comprehensive application empowers the business owner to seamlessly manage multiple salon locations through a single interface.
features: Store Management: Owners can establish new store locations, complete with customizable operational hours, off days, and service offerings.
Employee Coordination: The platform facilitates the hiring of new employees and the precise management of their schedules.
Service Booking: Clients can conveniently schedule appointments, choosing their preferred store, time, and service provider.
Quality Assurance: All functionalities are rigorously tested to maintain high standards of reliability and user satisfaction.

projects.name: Game Interface
projects.linkText: Click here to open the link
projects.description: This project showcases an educational game web application, developed as a group endeavor. It features a user-friendly hero page designed to engage and educate users through interactive gaming experiences.
